This class represents an event in which the administrator can create questions and bet on them.

This class represents a possible forecast for a question on which the application users can place their bets.

Formatter
This class introduces some static methods for data formatting.
History
This class is used to record the user's navigation.
IncorrectPSWConfirmException
Exception for different password and password confirmation field error.
InvalidDateException
Exception for Invalid Date creation.
InvalidPasswordException
 
LateBetException
Thrown if the gambler tries to place a bet an hour before on the event associated with the forecast.
LiquidityLackException
Exception for when user wants to place a bet with not enough money available.

This class serves as a controller for the navigation bar.
NoMatchingPatternException
Exception for throwing when the predetermined pattern does not match the given one.
NoSessionStartedException
Exception for throwing when a session has not been started.
NotEnoughMoneyInWalletException
Exception that occurs when there is not enough money in the wallet.
ObjectDbManagerServer
Runs the Data Access node as a separate, possibly remote process.
PswTooShortException
Exception for throwing when the password is too short.

UsernameAlreadyInDBException
